home.title: Welcome to EchoMingle!
home.subtitle: EchoMingle is a platform that allows you to `mingle` in real-time. All you need is a webcam and a microphone.
home.subtitle_1: Easily communicate with your colleagues, friends, and family from anywhere in the world. Ukrainian language is now available to all EchoMingle users. Join us!
home.subtitle_2: Try EchoMingle right now! The first month of mingling is free! Ukrainians enjoy a special offer: 50% discount on the annual subscription plan.

free.title: Free
free.description: The first month of mingling is free!

yearly.title: Yearly Plan
yearly.description: Stay connected for the whole year! 50% discount for Ukrainians!

enterprise.title: Business
enterprise.description: Contact us for information on business plans.
